name: 2oz Olive Oil Soap
description:
2oz Olive oil Soap Bar
You choose fragrance.
Color Choices are Clear,sea foam,lilac or peach
 Amber Romance* : A warm blend with slight floral hints of jasmine & violet and an overall heavy woody effect.

Baby Powder* : Soft powder notes with a undertone of rose, jasmine and violets

Banana Nut Bread* : Fresh baked classic with cooked bananas and nuts 

Bayberry* : Cinnamon & clove mixed with cedarwood & spruce enhanced by peppermint on a dry down of vanilla. 

Berry Creme Brulee* : A luscious blend of strawberries, raspberries, and oranges surrounded by delicious creamy notes of baked French Vanilla custard and sweet butter... 

Best Friends* : A blend of Strawberry, Bayberry, Vanilla, Raspberry, and Fir 

Black Raspberry Vanilla* : A luscious blend of raspberries, strawberries, coconut lemon, peach and vanilla.

Blueberry Cobbler* : A fruity creamy bouquet with a lactony sweet background

Butt Naked* : A green fruity bouquet with strawberry, banana, peach and melon topnotes with sweet lactony background 

Candy Kitchen* : A refreshing medley of cool peppermint, crisp eucalyptus and soft creamy vanilla 

Carnation* : The fragrant springtime aroma of fresh carnation blossoms surrounded by hints of rose and the fruitiness of oranges and raspberries...

Cheesecake* : Perfect aroma of cheesecake

China Rain* : Floral bouquet with a strong raspberry background

Cotton Candy* : Sticky sweet vanilla aroma with light fruity notes 

Creme Brulee* : A buttery creamy bouquet with a rich vanilla background 

Endless Love* (Victoria Secret Type) : A Mix of fruit & floral on a background of musk & vanilla 

Gardenia* : Floral blend with a strong orange flavor bottom note

Hazelnut* : Bitter sweet chocolate with crushed hazelnuts

Honeysuckle* : Fresh honeysuckle blend with hints of jasmine, rose, and lilac

Hot Maple Toddy* : A blend of reich maple, creamy vanilla, soft butter spiked with the essence of rum.  

Lavender* : Floral bouquet of rose, carnation & violet enhanced by jasmine & lavender on a dry down of patchouli,..

Love Spell* : Sweet bouquet of mandarin, bergamot & orange enhanced by hints of peach & berries on an undertone of musk

Magnolia* : A fragrant blend of exotic white flowers

Moonlight Path* : Musk bouquet enhanced by exotic woods with hints of flowers

Passionate Kisses* : A fruity Victoria Secret type fragrance

Peaches & Cream* : Fresh picked peach with sweet smooth cream 

Rose* : Red roses freshly cut from the florist with a light woody background

Smoke Eliminator* : Green citrus bouquet of bergamot, lime, lemon & orange on a dry down of "cut grass"

Spring Morning Dew* : Floral blend of lilies, roses & cyclamen enhanced by fruits such as peach, apple, raspberry & pineapple with hints of fresh melon on a sweet dry down of wood...

Starbuck's Coffee Type* : Signature coffee from the famous coffee house chain. Strong and bitter.

Strawberries & Cream* : Fresh cut ripe strawberries topped with cool whipped cream

Strawberry Jam* : Like opening a fresh jar of Strawberry Preserves 

Sugar Cookie* : Sweet sugary aroma of a fresh baked sugar cookie 

Vanilla Bean* : Freshly picked pods from the madagascar plant

Vanilla Lace Type* : A blend of Musk, Vanilla, Sandalwood, and Floral undertones 

Warm Vanilla Sugar* : African vanilla beans sweetened with sandalwood and coconut on a base of white flowers 

White Christmas (Sleighbells)* : A floral bouquet with citrus and almond topnotes with a sweet musky background.

name: 4oz White Glycerin Soap

name: Super Cute Set of 2 Dragonfly Kids Glycerin Soap in Cotton Candy Scent
description:
This is such a cute set of 2, 4 oz bars of glycerin soap that would be perfect for a child. The embossed dragonfly has been done in a white glycerin to stand out from the deep purple bar. Cotton candy scent. Gentle on the skin.

I do combine shipping. The photo shows one bar, you will receive 2.

name: 2 Olive Oil Massage Bar Soaps Scented with Endless Love
description:
Set of two massage bar soaps weighing 2.8 oz and 3.2 oz.
Olive oil makes them very nourishing for the skin.
Scented with Endless love, a very clean, fresh scent a mix of fruit and floral with a musk and vanilla background. VS type scent.
